Users can manage threads in their worksp.name: Users can manage threads in their workspaces
Users can manage threads in their worksp.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM workspaces w
   WHERE ((w.id = chat_threads.workspace_id) AND (w.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text)))))
   OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM workspace_collaborators c
   WHERE ((c.workspace_id = chat_threads.workspace_id) AND (c.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text)))))

Users can insert their own profile.name: Users can insert their own profile

Users can update their own profile.name: Users can update their own profile

Users can view their own profile.name: Users can view their own profile

Owners can manage collaborators.name: Owners can manage collaborators
Owners can manage collaborators.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM workspaces w
  WHERE ((w.id = workspace_collaborators.workspace_id) AND (w.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text)))))

Users can insert workspace events they h.name: Users can insert workspace events they have write access to
Users can insert workspace events they h.withCheck:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM workspaces
  WHERE ((workspaces.id = workspace_events.workspace_id) AND (workspaces.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text))))) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM workspace_collaborators c
  WHERE ((c.workspace_id = workspace_events.workspace_id) AND (c.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text)) AND (c.permission_level = 'editor'::text))))

Users can read workspace events they hav.name: Users can read workspace events they have access to
Users can read workspace events they hav.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM workspaces
  WHERE ((workspaces.id = workspace_events.workspace_id) AND (workspaces.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text))))) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM workspace_collaborators c
  WHERE ((c.workspace_id = workspace_events.workspace_id) AND (c.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text)))))

Public can view invite by token.name: Public can view invite by token

Users can insert invites for workspaces.name: Users can insert invites for workspaces they own/edit
Users can insert invites for workspaces.withCheck:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM workspaces w
  WHERE ((w.id = workspace_invites.workspace_id) AND (w.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text))))) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM workspace_collaborators c
  WHERE ((c.workspace_id = workspace_invites.workspace_id) AND (c.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text)) AND (c.permission_level = 'editor'::text))))

Users can manage reads for threads in th.name: Users can manage reads for threads in their workspaces
Users can manage reads for threads in th.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM chat_threads ct
   JOIN workspaces w ON w.id = ct.workspace_id
   WHERE ((ct.id = workspace_item_reads.thread_id) AND (w.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text)))))
   OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM chat_threads ct
   JOIN workspace_collaborators c ON c.workspace_id = ct.workspace_id
   WHERE ((ct.id = workspace_item_reads.thread_id) AND (c.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text)))))

Public can view share link by token.name: Public can view share link by token

Owners and editors can manage share link.name: Owners and editors can manage share links
Owners and editors can manage share link.using:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM workspaces w
  WHERE ((w.id = workspace_share_links.workspace_id) AND (w.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text))))) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM workspace_collaborators c
  WHERE ((c.workspace_id = workspace_share_links.workspace_id) AND (c.user_id = (auth.jwt() ->> 'sub'::text)) AND (c.permission_level = 'editor'::text))))
